name: Pokémon Dardusk
overview: Introduction: Pokemon Dardusk is about a post-apocalyptic Pokémon world, where people and Pokémon come back from the dead. You play the game as Silver, Giovanni's son who has no clue what's going on around him and must fight to end the zombie crisis and some even larger and more ominous foes. Features: • Physical/Special Split. • Only Silver is playable. Because the story is about Silver and his adventures not anyone else. • Play as Silver. Yeah you can name your player anything but he's still Silver. You're out on a journey to set everything right and find your father. • Some Fakemon. There will mostly be the original Pokémon up to Gen 3. • Indoor running. • New maps. It will be based on Kanto but a more post-apocalyptic Kanto. • Zombies. Zombie Pokémon and people. Yeah kind of like Pokémon Snakewood. • Violence/adult themes. This is not a little kid's world anymore. There are curse words in this game. • No gyms. You find your badges randomly around Kanto. • There will be some new music. • Scavenging. Everything won't be given to you on a silver platter, you have to find/earn them.
